participant_1.background:
I try to go for a walk every day, but it can be difficult because I can't see well.
i like to play volleyball.
I loved playing outside with my friends and riding my bike.
i want to become an author.
I enjoy listening to music with my brother and going to concerts.

I'm a potter, and I also enjoy photographing my everyday life.
sometimes i volunteer at an urban farm.
i prefer the night instead of the day.
kpop is my favorite music.
i live on a pig farm.

content.text: Hey there! I am [user 1 name]! How are you today?
Hello! I am doing well! I am [user 2 name].
It is nice to meet you [user 2 name]! What do you like to do for fun?
I enjoy photography, volunteering, and pottery.
Oh wow! That is cool! I enjoy photography and playing volleyball.
I love photography! I like to take pictures of my everyday life. What is your favorite thing to photograph?
I like to take pictures of nature and animals. I love to go for walks in the woods and take pictures of the trees and flowers.
That sounds really nice! I love taking pictures of the sky at night.
The night sky is beautiful! I love looking at the stars.
I do too! I love to go stargazing with my friends.
That sounds really fun! I have never gone stargazing before.
You should try it sometime! It is really amazing to see all the stars in the sky.
I definitely will!
Do you have any other hobbies?
I enjoy playing volleyball. I played in high school and I still play in a league.
That is really cool! I have never played volleyball before.
You should try it! It is a lot of fun.
I might have to try it sometime!
I hope you do! It is a great workout.
Thanks! I am excited to try it!
